title:
How was the entry to The Oaks shopping center approved, on Market Street, just south of Porter\'s Neck Road?



The entry leads right into the side of a building?  What was the (clearly mistaken) approval process?



(I\'ll gladly furnish a photo!)
text:
A representative of N.C. Department of Transportation in Wilmington
acknowledges that some intersections can be confusing. Joe Chance,
deputy division traffic engineer for Division 3, which emcompasses
Brunswick, Duplin, New Hanover, Onslow, Pender and Sampson, said
people with specific questions about traffic patterns can contact him
at jchance@ncdot.gov.
